Detailed Description

A class that contains one Face or Surface's tessellated data.

mgTLData includes the following two newed pointers: mgTLparameter* m_tlparam; //newed tl parameter. mgTLRects* m_rects; //newed tl rects. mgTLTriangles* m_triangles; //newed mgTLTriangles pointer. mgTLPoints* m_tlpoints; //newed mgTLPoints pointer. These pointers are treated as std::auto_ptr. When copied, or assigned, the ownership are transfered to the new mgTLData object and the original object's pointers are set null.

To rendering by shading model, use mgGDL::shade().

Parameters:
obj テセレーションするフェイス Must be MGFace or MGSurface.
crvTol バウンダリのトレランス
surfTol 平面とみなすトレランス
max_ratio 最大アスペクト比
fk fk=SINGLE_TRIANGLE: 1 triangle/FAN fk=MULTIPLE_TRIANGLES: as many triangles as possible/FAN
minimum_tri Specify minimum number of triangles.
max_edge_len when max_edge_len<=0, this means no limits on an edge length.

void mgTLData::compute_non_corner_texture_coordinates (  ) 

compute all the non corner texture coordinates of this m_tlpoints.

compute_non_corner_texture_coordinates can be invoked only after all the rects are textured.

void mgTLData::compute_texture_coordinates ( const MGPosition &  uv,
const MGPosition &  st,
const MGUnit_vector &  texXaxis,
double  distortion_ratio = -1. 
)

MGCL_DLL.

compute all the texture coordinates of this m_tlpoints. compute_texture_coordinates can be invoked only after triangulate().

Parameters:
uv surface parameter of the point st.
st texture coordinate of uv.
texXaxis world coordinate x axis vector.
distortion_ratio When >1. distorted points(points whose ratio are more than distortion_ratio or less than 1/distortion_ratio will be stored in m_tex_distorted.
bool mgTLData::compute_texture_coordinates_partially ( int &  id_hhis,
const MGHHisect &  hhis,
const MGPosition &  uv,
const MGPosition &  st,
const MGUnit_vector &  texXaxis,
double  distortion_ratio = -1. 
)

compute all the texture coordinates of this m_tlpoints.

compute_texture_coordinates can be invoked only after triangulate(). Function's return value is true if textured.

Parameters:
id_hhis id of hhis that define the current priority line of uv is input. When id_hhis>=hhis.size(), no priority lines are input, and all the rects will be textured from the point uv. id of hhis to process next face(mgTLData) will be output.
st texture coordinate of uv.
texXaxis world coordinate x axis vector.
distortion_ratio When >1. distorted points(points whose ratio are more than distortion_ratio or less than 1/distortion_ratio will be stored in m_tex_distorted.
void mgTLData::compute_uv_texture_coordinate ( const MGVector &  normal,
const MGPosition &  uv,
const MGPosition &  uv1,
const MGPosition &  st1,
const MGPosition &  uv2,
const MGPosition &  st2,
MGPosition &  st 
) const

compute the texture coordinates of the point uv from the data of 2 points, (uv1, st1) and (uv2, st2).

Here uvx means the surface parameter and stx does texture coordinates known.

Parameters:
normal Normal closest plane of the objective mgTLRect.
uv surface parameter of the point st to compute.
uv1 surface parameter of the point st1.
st1 texture coordinate of uv1.
uv2 surface parameter of the point st2.
st2 texture coordinate of uv2.
st texture coordinate of uv will be output.
void mgTLData::drawt_texture_image_part ( const MGTextureImage2 &  teximage,
const double  back_color[4],
int  plane_id 
) const

Draw textures within the m_texture_planes[plane_id].

Parameters:
teximage texture image data.
back_color back ground color data.
plane_id indicates if only parts of texture data be drawn. let i1=m_texture_planes[plane_id]->index(), and i2=m_texture_planes[plane_id+1]->index(). Then rects of m_rects[i1] to m_rects[i2-1] are to be drawn.

const MGFace* mgTLData::face_pointer (  )  const

Obtain the MGFace pointer if this is the data of MGFace, else null will be returned.

bool mgTLData::find_textured_and_compute ( mgTLDataVector &  tldvec,
double  distortion_ratio 
)

Search neighboring faces that is alreday texture computed, then after contact rectagles texture computation, compute the whole recttangle in this tlData.

This is assumed not to be texture-computed yet. Function's return value is true if neighboring texture-computed face is found and texture-computed. false if not texture-computed.

Parameters:
distortion_ratio When >1. distorted points(points whose ratio are more than distortion_ratio or less than 1/distortion_ratio will be stored in m_tex_distorted.
void mgTLData::get_texcoord_world ( size_t  i,
MGPosition &  st,
MGPosition &  world,
const MGVector &  base 
) const

Get texture coordinates and world coordinates, given m_tlpoints id i.

Parameters:
st (s,t) will be output, which is biased by base.
world world (x,y,x) value of the point (s,t) will be output.
bool mgTLData::get_texXaxis ( const MGPosition &  uv,
MGPosition &  st,
MGUnit_vector &  texXaxis2 
) const

Assumed this is already textured, compute texture coordinate at the point uv, and the world coordinate direction of the s-axtis.

Function's return value is true if data is obtained successfully, false if the rect at uv is not textured and data was not obtained.

Parameters:
uv parameter value of the face to compute at.
st texture coordinate will be output.
texXaxis2 the s-axis direction at uv in world coordinate.

void mgTLData::record_tex_distortion ( const MGPosition &  uvr  ) 

Record the distortion point.

uvr is (uvr[0], uvr[1]) is the surface parameter, and uvr[2] is the distortion ratio.

TEXTURE_STATUS mgTLData::textured (  )  const [inline]

Test if this tlData's texture coordinates are computed invoking compute_texture_coordinates() .

True will be returned if invoked.

mgTESTRIANG mgTLData::triangle_type ( size_t  i  )  const

Obtain the i-th triangle's type.

=mgTESTRIANG_FAN:fan, =mgTESTRIANG_STRIP:strip.
